QuestData.Title: Back from Beyond
QuestData.Description: We must begin preparations for the Talon King's return.$B$BFrom within this realm, I can travel quickly to Veil Terokk.$B$BYou, however, should be returned to the other side. You are powerful, and will attract unwanted attention.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Shadow Sage Iskar in Veil Terokk.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Shadow Sage Iskar in Veil Terokk.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. Ishaal and Zellek have already begun the rites.
